title: FT: t201 Brown SGC 20.....need your t206 Brown
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FT: t201 Brown SGC 20.....need your t206 Brown
posts.post_content:
I am needing a t206 Brown (any version) in an SGC or PSA holder.  I'd like for my t201 Brown to be involved in the trade somehow, but open to other possibilities.  The white spot to the right of the card on the case is not actually on the case.  LMK if interested!

Jimi
